results.title: Focal adhesion kinase-related pathways may be suppressed by metformin in vascular smooth muscle cells in high glucose conditions
results.text_hl: The results showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may suppress the proliferation and migration of VSMCs via @GENE_PTK2 @GENE_5747 @@@FAK@@@-related pathways and may retard the progression of @<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@vessel stenosis@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

results.title: Coronary imaging characteristics and risk factors in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus with coronary heart disease complication.
results.text_hl: The observation group demonstrated a higher right coronary artery (RCA@<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@) stenosis@@@ index (t = 6.730, P = 0.000), circumflex coronary artery (LCX) @<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@stenosis@@@ index (t = 5.738, P = 0.000), and total @<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@stenosis@@@ index (t = 7.049, P = 0.000) than the control group.

results.title: Effects of metformin on changes of miR-19a and miR-221 expression associated with myocardial infarction in patients with type 2 diabetes.
results.text_hl: AIM: This study aimed to measure the expression of two microRNAs, which are involved in the risk of MI and @<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@vascular stenosis@@@ among @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users and non-users with MI.

results.title: The protective effect and underlying mechanism of metformin on neointima formation in fructose-induced insulin resistant rats
results.text_hl: This study investigated the protective effects and underlying mechanisms of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in balloon-injury induced @<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@stenosis@@@ in @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ resistant @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Inhibition of neointima hyperplasia by the combined therapy of linagliptin and metformin via AMPK/Nox4 signaling in diabetic rats.
results.text_hl: This study provided new therapeutic strategies for @<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@vascular stenosis@@@ associated with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

results.title: AMERICAN ASSOCIATION OF CLINICAL ENDOCRINOLOGISTS, AMERICAN COLLEGE OF ENDOCRINOLOGY, AND ANDROGEN EXCESS AND PCOS SOCIETY DISEASE STATE CLINICAL REVIEW: GUIDE TO THE BEST PRACTICES IN THE EVALUATION AND TREATMENT OF POLYCYSTIC OVARY SYNDROME - PART 2.
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ under 60 years of age undergoing coronary angiography, the presence of @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovaries@@@ on sonography has been associated with more arterial segments with >50% @<m>DISEASE_Constriction_Pathologic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003251 @@@stenosis@@@, but the relationship between @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ and actual cardiovascular events remains unclear.

citations.NLM: Goodman NF, Cobin RH, Futterweit W, Glueck JS, Legro RS, Carmina E, American Association of Clinical Endocrinologists (AACE), American College of Endocrinology (ACE), Androgen Excess and PCOS Society.
